title: HabitFlow: Lifestyle Architect
description: Intelligent habit tracking app with ML-powered insights and beautiful Material You design.
details: Advanced Android app featuring Jetpack Compose UI, Room database with complex streak algorithms, Hilt dependency injection, and TensorFlow Lite for on-device pattern recognition. Includes PDF/Excel export, home screen widgets, and privacy-first local analytics.

images.caption: Dark mode dashboard with daily streak tracking

title: Keyword Scout: Product Optimizer
description: Chrome extension for e-commerce product listing optimization with AI-powered insights.
details: Real-time product page analyzer for Amazon and Shopify. Features attribute gap detection, keyword modifier suggestions, and optimized copy generation. Built with React, TypeScript, and Chrome Manifest V3. Includes offline heuristics and multi-provider AI fallback for resilience.

images.caption: Extension popup with key metrics at a glance

title: LSPosed SMS Hook
description: Advanced system-level SMS interception module for Xposed/LSPosed.
details: A deep system module capable of intercepting outgoing SMS protocols at the framework level. Features include smart text appending, universal interception across apps, and handling of multipart messages. Demonstrates understanding of Android internals and secure data handling.

title: The Good Portfolio
description: This portfolio website: Framework-free showcase of modern web design and performance.
details: Built with vanilla JavaScript and Vite to demonstrate mastery of core web technologies. Features glassmorphism design, CSS variables, performant animations, and dynamic project filtering with slideshow galleries. Achieves 100/100 Lighthouse performance score without heavy frameworks.

images.caption: Meta-view: The code you are browsing right now

title: CyberSec: SQLi Scanner
description: Web-based SQL injection scanner and reporting tool.
details: Orchestrates SQLMap scans via a modern React UI. Features real-time WebSocket output, multi-user JWT authentication, and automated reporting. Designed as a developer-friendly tool for focused security assessments.

title: Json_Hub
description: Smart JSON converter with auto-unescape and flattening to Excel/CSV formats.
details: Client-side web application that transforms nested, double-encoded JSON into clean spreadsheet formats. Features Monaco editor with syntax highlighting, smart flattening with dot notation, circular reference detection, and multiple export formats (CSV, Excel, HTML, ZIP). All processing happens in-browser with 10MB file support.

title: CameraInterceptor
description: Xposed module for intercepting and replacing camera streams with custom images.
details: Universal camera hook supporting android.hardware.Camera (Legacy), camera2 (Modern), and androidx.camera (CameraX). Features image injection from gallery, seamless system-wide integration, and configurable settings. Built for Android 8.0+ with LSPosed/EdXposed support.

title: 49Blox: Music Exchange
description: Digital music collectibles exchange and investment platform.
details: A platform where fans own music shares ('Blox'). Features user auth with 2FA, song uploads, secondary marketplace, and real-time trading orderbook. Built with Node.js and MySQL.

title: Custom Admin Welcome
description: WordPress plugin for custom admin dashboard welcome widgets.
details: Provides a professional, branded welcome panel for WordPress admins with customizable messages and quick action links. Features a responsive design and smooth hover effects.

title: OIT: Educational Platform
description: Educational platform with quadratic equation solver and student dashboard.
details: PHP-based learning platform featuring step-by-step quadratic equation solver with multi-method explanations, calculator utilities (percentage, geometry), student dashboard, authentication system, and admin panel for message management. Built with Bootstrap 5 and responsive design.

title: Coddle: Daily Code Game
details: Guess the 5-letter programming term in 6 tries. Features mobile-first design, dark mode, and shareable results. Built with Nuxt 3.
